entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
